name: 艾伦·约欧娃
introduction: Eleni Yiovas is an actor and producer based out of New York City. She has had the pleasure of working on-screen with directors Michael Showalter, Stavroula Toska, and Emmy Award winner Cady Mclain. She is a graduate of The William Esper Studio and has studied with Larry Moss, Scott Freeman, Howard Fine and Bob Krakower. She earned a double B.A. in History and Media Studies from CUNY, and worked in production for two years working for Emmy Award-winning documentary filmmakers Marc Levin and Daphne Pinkerson for feature projects, documentaries and miniseries for HBO, PBS and The Discovery Channel.
